info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 6 at 12:21PM EDT until April 7 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Northern Indiana
info.description:
...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Indiana...
Mississinewa River near Marion affecting Grant, Wabash and Miami Counties.
...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Indiana...
Salamonie River below Warren affecting Huntington, Wells, Blackford, Jay and Wabash Counties.
Wabash River near Bluffton IN affecting Wells County.
...The Flood Warning is cancelled for the following rivers in Indiana...
Salamonie River at Portland affecting Jay County.
For the Mississinewa River...including Marion...Minor flooding is forecast. For the Salamonie River...including Warren, Portland...Minor flooding is forecast. For the Wabash River...including Linn Grove, Bluffton IN, Wabash, Logansport...Moderate flooding is forecast.
* WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast.
* WHERE...Mississinewa River near Marion.
* WHEN...Until tomorrow evening.
* IMPACTS...At 12.0 feet, River is at flood stage. Water begins to enter Matter Park and crosses north Washington Street. Basements and homes along Boots Creek begin to flood. A few residents along River Road become concerned. Flood water approaches restaurant near Charles Park
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:45 AM EDT Sunday the stage was 11.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 12.0 feet this afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage this evening. - Flood stage is 12.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas.
Detailed river forecasts and additional information can be found at www.weather.gov/iwx under Rivers and Lakes.
The next statement will be issued this afternoon at 130 PM EDT.

parameter.value: FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL TOMORROW EVENING

area.areaDesc: Grant, IN; Miami, IN; Wabash, IN
